WikiMins

WikiMins is an app that combines the speed reading technology of spritz with the Wikipedia API.
Spritzing presents reading content with the ORP located at the specific place where you’re already looking, allowing you to read without having to move your eyes. With this approach, reading becomes more efficient because Spritzing decreases time searching for the next word’s ORP.
Combined with the Wiki API this means that the plethora of information on wikipedia can be accessed on the go and consumed at a much greater rate than the traditional wikipedia app.
I first started to write the app ...
